intro: Become humanity's last hope. Gear up, upgrade, and unleash hell in a relentless third-person sci-fi shooter against a ruthless robotic army. The future is yours to forge in fire and steel.
description:
The War for Tomorrow Begins in Your Hangar.

Earth has fallen silent. The once-great colonies are now tombs of steel, overrun by a merciless steel legion. As a veteran combat specialist, you are thrust into the heart of the conflict—the last spark of resistance against the cold, calculating darkness.

An Arsenal of Retribution.
Unleash a devastating array of sci-fi weaponry. Incinerate waves of drones with a plasma rifle, punch through armored cores with a rocket launcher or disintegrate foes with energy-based shotguns. Find your favorite, then make it better.

Forge Your Own Legend.
Victory earns you credits. Spend them in your mobile hangar, the heart of your operation. This is where a soldier becomes a legend. Augment your combat suit with enhanced shields, jet-powered dodges, and reactive armor. Upgrade your weapons with faster fire rates and larger magazines. Every upgrade is a step toward tipping the scales of war.

Adapt to Survive.
No two battles are the same. The steel threat is diverse and relentless.

Annihilation.
Storm enemy strongholds with a single objective: total destruction of all hostiles.

Last Stand.
Defend vital resistance bases against overwhelming waves of attackers. Hold the line, or everything is lost.

Titan Slayer.
Face off against colossal boss machines, each with unique, earth-shattering attacks and devastating weak points. These epic encounters will test every upgrade and skill you possess.

Key Features:

Intense Third-Person Combat.
Fast-paced, fluid shooting with a tactical edge.

Deep Progression System.
Extensive upgrades for your weapons, armor, and abilities in your personal hangar.

Diverse Enemy Forces.
Battle agile drones, heavy assault robots, and screen-filling boss titans.

Varied Mission Types.
Annihilation, base defense, and epic boss battles across multiple sci-fi landscapes.

Powerful Arsenal.
Unlock and master a wide variety of weapons.

The machine war waits for no one. Suit up, soldier. The future needs a champion.
